p: The MIC and MFC values of C. carvi EO were determined and then compared with those of fluconazole against the standard clinical isolate of C. albicans ( Table 1). Based on the results, the MIC and MFC values of plant EO against C. albicans were 320 and 640 μg/ml, respectively. For fluconazole, these values were reported as 4 and 8 μg/ml, respectively.
